thread.title: Man arrested in Delhi after shooting at his parents
thread.title_full: Man arrested in Delhi after shooting at his parents | Latest News & Updates at Daily News & Analysis

author: dna     | From the print edition
title: Man arrested in Delhi after shooting at his parents
text:
A man in his 20s was arrested by Delhi Police after he allegedly shot at his parents over a family dispute in southwest Delhi. The accused identified as Amit, injured both his parents after shooting at them right after they were leaving his apartment when the trio had engaged in a heated argument.
The injured were identified as Bhrhamprakash (49) and his wife Savita (45). The couple were rushed to the hospital by police which reached the spot after neighbours reported the matter.
According to police, the couple have four sons and they had been living with the eldest in Dwarka area. On Sunday evening, the couple decided to visit their younger son who also lives in Dwarka along with her wife and a child.
"They had a heated argument over some family dispute and the couple decided to walk out of the flat. Just when they had reached the car parking area, the accused shot at the couple from the balcony of his flat which was at the first floor of the building," said a police officer.
According to police, the husband was injured in his hip and legs while the mother of the accused received bullet injuries in her feet. The accused was taken into custody and booked under relevant sections of the Indian Penal Code.
